name: The Internship
tagline: Two salesmen whose careers have been torpedoed by the digital age find their way into a coveted internship at Google, where they must compete with a group of young, tech-savvy geniuses for a shot at employment.

name: Meet Joe Black
tagline: A media mogul acts as a guide to Death, who takes the form of a young man to learn about life on Earth and in the process, fall in love with his guide's daughter.

name: The Good Son
tagline: A young boy stays with his aunt and uncle, and befriends his cousin who's the same age. But his cousin begins showing increasing signs of violent behavior.

name: Lost in Translation
tagline: A faded movie star and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.

name: Napoleon Dynamite
tagline: A listless and alienated teenager decides to help his new friend win the class presidency in their small western high school, while he must deal with his bizarre family life back home.

name: The Negotiator
tagline: In a desperate attempt to prove his innocence, a skilled police negotiator accused of corruption and murder takes hostages in a government office to gain the time he needs to find the truth.

name: Instructions Not Included
tagline: A man who has made a new life for himself and the daughter left on his doorstep 6 years ago finds his family threatened when the birth mother resurfaces.

name: Timecop
tagline: An officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who has a tie to his past.

name: The Three Stooges
tagline: While trying to save their childhood orphanage, Moe, Larry, and Curly inadvertently stumble into a murder plot and wind up starring in a reality TV show.

name: Confessions of a Shopaholic
tagline: A college grad lands a job as a financial journalist in New York City to support where she nurtures her shopping addiction and falls for a wealthy entrepreneur.

name: Amistad
tagline: About a 1839 mutiny aboard a slave ship that is traveling towards the northeastern coast of America. Much of the story involves a court-room drama about the free man who led the revolt.

name: The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants 2
Passenger 57
tagline: An airline security expert must take action when he finds himself trapped on a passenger jet when terrorists seize control of it.

name: The Beverly Hillbillies
tagline: A feature adaptation of the classic TV show, when nice guy redneck Jed Clampett strikes it rich when he finds black oil, and moves he and his kin to posh Beverly Hills.

name: The Lovely Bones
tagline: Centers on a young girl who has been murdered and watches over her family - and her killer - from purgatory. She must weigh her desire for vengeance against her desire for her family to heal.

name: Speed Racer
tagline: A young driver, Speed Racer, aspires to be champion of the racing world with the help of his family and his high-tech Mach 5 automobile.

name: The One
tagline: A sheriff's deputy fights an alternate universe version of himself who grows stronger with each alternate self he kills.

name: Must Love Dogs
tagline: A forty-something preschool teacher looks to the personals for a change of pace and a relationship, with hilarious results.

name: Always
tagline: A romantic adventure about a legendary pilot's passion for dare-devil firefighting and his girl.

name: Soul Surfer
tagline: Teenage surfer Bethany Hamilton overcomes the odds and her own fears of returning to the water after losing her left arm in a shark attack.

name: Wall Street
tagline: A young and impatient stockbroker is willing to do anything to get to the top, including trading on illegal inside information taken through a ruthless and greedy corporate raider who takes the youth under his wing.

name: Prom Night
tagline: Donna's senior prom is supposed to be the best night of her life, though a sadistic killer from her past has different plans for her and her friends.

name: Diamonds Are Forever
tagline: A diamond smuggling investigation leads James Bond to Las Vegas, where he uncovers an extortion plot headed by his nemesis, Ernst Stavro Blofeld.

name: License to Wed
tagline: A reverend puts an engaged couple through a grueling marriage preparation course to see if they are meant to be married in his church.

name: Underdog
tagline: A Beagle must use his newly-bestowed superpowers to defend Capitol City from mad scientist Simon Barsinister.

name: Pokémon: The Movie 2000
tagline: Ash Ketchum must gather the three spheres of fire, ice and lightning in order to restore balance to the Orange Islands.

name: West Side Story
tagline: Musical about two youngsters from rival NYC gangs who fall in love.

name: Under the Tuscan Sun
tagline: A writer impulsively buys a villa in Tuscany in order to change her life.

name: Cats & Dogs: The Revenge of Kitty Galore
tagline: The ongoing war between the canine and feline species is put on hold when they join forces to thwart a rogue cat spy with her own sinister plans for conquest.

name: We Are Marshall
tagline: When a plane crash claims the lives of members of the Marshall University football team and some of its fans, the team's new coach and his surviving players try to keep the football program alive.

name: City Slickers II: The Legend of Curly's Gold
tagline: Shortly after their first western adventure, Mitch Robbins and his friends discover a treasure map that belonged to their late trail guide Curly and set out to discover its secrets.

name: Hubble 3D
tagline: An IMAX 3D camera chronicles the effort of 7 astronauts aboard the Space Shuttle Atlantis to repair the Hubble Space Telescope.

name: A River Runs Through It
tagline: Two fly-fishing sons of a Presbyterian minister--one reserved, one rebellious--grow up in rural Montana.

name: Tears of the Sun
tagline: A Special-Ops commander leads his team into the Nigerian jungle in order to rescue a doctor who will only join them if they agree to save 70 refugees too.

name: Year One
tagline: After being banished from their tribe, two hunter-gatherers encounter Biblical characters and eventually wind up in the city of Sodom.

name: Edge of Darkness
tagline: As homicide detective Thomas Craven investigates the death of his activist daughter, he uncovers not only her secret life, but a corporate cover-up and government collusion that attracts an agent tasked with cleaning up the evidence.

name: K-9
tagline: To stop an elusive criminal, a maverick detective enlists the aid of a police dog who's an unusually intelligent smart alec.

name: Point Break
tagline: An FBI agent goes undercover to catch a gang of bank robbers who may be surfers.

name: Biloxi Blues
tagline: A group of young recruits go through boot camp during the Second World War in Biloxi Mississippi. From the play by Neil Simon.

name: Star Trek: Nemesis
tagline: After the Enterprise is diverted to the Romulan homeworld Romulus, supposedly because they want to negotiate a peace treaty, the Federation soon find out the Romulans are planning an attack on Earth.

name: You Only Live Twice
tagline: Agent 007 and the Japanese secret service ninja force must find and stop the true culprit of a series of spacejackings before nuclear war is provoked.

name: No Reservations
tagline: The life of a top chef changes when she becomes the guardian of her young niece.

name: Transporter 2
tagline: Mercenary Frank Martin, who specializes moving goods of all kinds, surfaces again this time in Miami, Florida when he's implicated in the kidnapping of the young son of a powerful USA official.

name: Reign of Fire
tagline: A brood of fire-breathing dragons emerges from the earth and begins setting fire to everything, establishing dominance over the planet.

name: Need for Speed
tagline: Fresh from prison, a street racer who was framed by a wealthy business associate joins a cross country race with revenge in mind. His ex-partner, learning of the plan, places a massive bounty on his head as the race begins.

name: Wag the Dog
tagline: Shortly before an election, a spin-doctor and a Hollywood producer join efforts to fabricate a war in order to cover up a presidential sex scandal.

name: Meatballs
tagline: Wacky hijinks of counselors and campers at a less-than-average summer camp.

name: Rumor Has It...
tagline: Sarah Huttinger is a woman who learns that her family was the inspiration for the book and film "The Graduate" -- and that she just might be the offspring of the well-documented event.

name: Snitch
tagline: A father goes undercover for the DEA in order to free his son who was imprisoned after being set up in drug deal.

name: The Devil's Own
tagline: A police officer uncovers the real identity of his house-guest, an I.R.A. terrorist in hiding.

name: Gulliver's Travels
tagline: Travel writer Lemuel Gulliver takes an assignment in Bermuda, but ends up on the island of Liliput, where he towers over its tiny citizens.

name: Cabaret
tagline: A female girlie club entertainer in Weimar Republic era Berlin romances two men while the Nazi Party rises to power around them.

name: Death at a Funeral
tagline: A funeral ceremony turns into a debacle of exposed family secrets and misplaced bodies.

name: Rambo
tagline: In Thailand, John Rambo joins a group of mercenaries to venture into war-torn Burma, and rescue a group of Christian aid workers who were kidnapped by the ruthless local infantry unit.

name: Heartbreak Ridge
tagline: A hard-nosed, hard-living Marine gunnery sergeant clashes with his superiors and his ex-wife as he takes command of a spoiled recon platoon with a bad attitude.

name: Mannequin
tagline: A young artist, searching for his vocation, makes a mannequin so perfect he falls in love with it. Finding the mannequin in a store window, he gets a job there and his creation comes to life.

name: Sense and Sensibility
tagline: Rich Mr. Dashwood dies, leaving his second wife and her three daughters poor by the rules of inheritance. The two eldest daughters are the titular opposites.

name: The Lizzie McGuire Movie
tagline: Lizzie McGuire has graduated from middle school and takes a trip to Rome, Italy with her class. And what was supposed to be only a normal trip, becomes a teenager's dream come true.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III
tagline: The turtles find themselves transported back in time to ancient Japan.

name: Glory Road
tagline: In 1966, Texas Western coach Don Haskins led the first all-black starting line-up for a college basketball team to the NCAA national championship.

name: Because I Said So
tagline: A meddling mother tries to set her daughter up with the right man so her kid won't follow in her footsteps.

name: The Unborn
tagline: A young woman fights the spirit that is slowly taking possession of her.

name: Beverly Hills Cop III
tagline: Axel Foley, while investigating a car theft ring, comes across something much bigger than that: the same men who shot his boss are running a counterfeit money ring out of a theme park in Los Angeles.

name: Final Destination 5
tagline: Survivors of a suspension-bridge collapse learn there's no way you can cheat Death.

name: Casino
tagline: Greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two mobster best friends and a trophy wife over a gambling empire.

name: Mask
tagline: A teenager with a massive facial skull deformity and biker gang mother attempts to live as normal a life as possible under the circumstances.

name: Step Up 3D
tagline: A tight-knit group of New York City street dancers,find themselves pitted against the world's best hip hop dancers in a high-stakes showdown.

name: Time Bandits
tagline: A young boy accidently joins a band of dwarves as they jump from time-period to time-period looking for treasure to steal.

name: Resident Evil: Retribution
tagline: Alice fights alongside a resistance movement in the continuing battle against the Umbrella Corporation and the undead.

name: Blue Thunder
tagline: The cop test pilot for an experimental police helicopter learns the sinister implications of the new vehicle.

name: Lady in the Water
tagline: Apartment building superintendent Cleveland Heep rescues what he thinks is a young woman from the pool he maintains. When he discovers that she is actually a character from a bedtime story who is trying to make the journey back to her home, he works with his tenants to protect his new friend from the creatures that are determined to keep her in our world.

name: Jaws 3-D
tagline: The sons of police chief Brody must protect civilians at a Sea World theme park after a 35-foot shark becomes trapped in the park with them.

name: Planet 51
tagline: American astronaut Captain Charles "Chuck" Baker lands on Planet 51 thinking he's the first person to step foot on it. To his surprise, he finds that this planet is inhabited by little green people who are happily living in a white picket fence world, and whose only fear is that it will be overrun by alien invaders...like Chuck!

name: Welcome Home, Roscoe Jenkins
tagline: A successful talk show host leaves Los Angeles to reunite with his family in the Deep South.

name: Fever Pitch
tagline: Lindsay is stuck in the middle of her relationship with Ben and his passion for the Boston Red Sox.

name: Drag Me to Hell
tagline: A loan officer who evicts an old woman from her home finds herself the recipient of a supernatural curse. Desperate, she turns to a seer to try and save her soul, while evil forces work to push her to a breaking point.

name: Spanglish
tagline: A woman and her daughter emigrate from Mexico for a better life in America, where they start working for a family where the patriarch is a newly celebrated chef with an insecure wife.

name: The Cabin in the Woods
tagline: Five friends go for a break at a remote cabin in the woods, where they get more than they bargained for. Together, they must discover the truth behind the cabin in the woods.

name: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels
tagline: Two con men try to settle their rivalry by betting on who can swindle a young American heiress out of $50.000 first.

name: Around the World in Eighty Days
tagline: Adaptation of Jules Verne's novel about a Victorian Englishman who bets that with the new steamships and railways he can do what the title says.

name: Romeo and Juliet
tagline: When the now famous "star crossed lovers" of two enemy families meet, forbidden love ensues.

name: Riddick
tagline: Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, Riddick finds himself up against an alien race of predators. Activating an emergency beacon alerts two ships: one carrying a new breed of mercenary, the other captained by a man from Riddick's past.

name: Donnie Brasco
tagline: An FBI undercover agent infilitrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the mafia life to the expense of his regular one.

name: Meet the Browns
tagline: A single mom takes her family to Georgia for the funeral of her father -- a man she never met. There, her clan is introduced to the crass, fun-loving Brown family.

name: The Fisher King
tagline: A former radio DJ, suicidally despondent because of a terrible mistake he made, finds redemption in helping a deranged homeless man who was an unwitting victim of that mistake.

name: Thir13en Ghosts
tagline: When Cyrus Kriticos, a very rich collector of unique things dies, he leaves it all to his nephew and his family. All including his house, his fortune, and his malicious collection of ghosts!

name: Nights in Rodanthe
tagline: A doctor who is traveling to see his estranged son sparks with an unhappily married woman at a North Carolina inn.

name: Homeward Bound: The Incredible Journey
tagline: Three pets escape from a California ranch to find their owners in San Francisco.

name: Exorcist: The Beginning
tagline: Years before Father Lancaster Merrin helped save Regan MacNeil's soul, he first encounters the demon Pazuzu in East Africa. This is the tale of Father Merrin's initial battle with Pazuzu and the rediscovery of his faith.

name: Aliens vs. Predator: Requiem
tagline: Warring alien and predator races descend on a small town, where unsuspecting residents must band together for any chance of survival.

name: The Hills Have Eyes
tagline: A suburban American family is being stalked by a group of psychotic people who live in the desert, far away from civilization.

name: Ronin
tagline: A freelancing former US intelligence agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by both the Irish and the Russians.

name: The Hours
tagline: The story of how the novel "Mrs. Dalloway" affects three generations of women, all of whom, in one way or another, have had to deal with suicide in their lives.
